name: Motion
overview: This section of the portfolio includes designs that move. Some of the pixel images can also be found in the Raster section.

images.name: Campus Life and Engagement Videos
description: Short animations for the McGill Office of Campus Life and Engagement (CL&E).
Above is a brief logo animation intended for use at the beginning or end of the videos circulated by the office.

The second animation is a 30-second 'advertisement' for CL&E to be shown on various TV screens around campus, among other places. A soundtrack is currently in production by a Music Production graduate student at McGill's Schulich School of Music.
